entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: wrap more exceptions with DbUpdateException #25631
    type-bug, area-cosmos, area-save-changes
  • Allow [NotParameterized] to work for query filters #25630
    type-enhancement, customer-reported
  • Bundle does not add startup project and failes with FileNotFoundException when running bundle with `--startup-project` #25625
    customer-reported
  • Bundle build error `NETSDK1045` with incorrect SDK when the .NET SDK is fixed with global.json #25622
    customer-reported
  • Test Comparison_with_value_converted_subclass fails on InMemory #25615
    type-bug, area-query, area-in-memory, 6.0.0
  • Updating embedded ICollection HashSet causes unchanged items to be removed from the context #25610
    customer-reported

Closed

  • SaveChangesAsync should not wrap OperationCancellationException with DbUpdateException #15074
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, punted-for-3.0, area-save-changes, 6.0.0
  • `Optimize-DbContext` Does Not Fully Qualify Types, Resulting in Compile Errors #25523
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc1
  • Publishing issues involving Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.dll and IIS. #25627
    customer-reported
  • Disable reference nullability in migrations and model snapshot #25624
    type-enhancement, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-migrations, 6.0.0
  • OData: Use EnableQueryAttribute.PageSize and $top for expanded collection together throws exception for ef core sql server provider #25607
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0-preview7
  • Warn on null required dependents in non-table-splitting case #24557
    closed-not-needed
  • NullReferenceException when using two Includes, all fine when using either one #25614
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0-preview7
  • Defining query/query filter throws when using shared type entity type Set overload #24601
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0
  • AsSplitQuery sporadically missing navigation properties #25556
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 3.1.[4-18] stop azure functions for logging dependency #25613
    closed-duplicate, customer-reported
  • How to find out which column(s) violated which constraints and checks when calling SaveChangesAsync() #25592
    closed-external, customer-reported
  • How to find out which column(s) violated constraints and checks when calling SaveChangesAsync() #25590
    closed-external, customer-reported
  • Execute Reader requires command to have transaction when connection assigned to command is in pending local trans #25496
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Problems with .Includes & .AsSplitQuery - timeouts and missing navigation properties #25466
    closed-could-not-reproduce, customer-reported
  • OData query with non mapped fields #25433
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Memory usage : big difference between 32 bits (500MB)/ 64 bits (1.4GB) #25441
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • EF Core Migrations broke EF 6 Migrations #25425
    closed-could-not-reproduce, customer-reported
  • OwnedType use HasData() throw a InvalidOperationException #25586
    closed-duplicate, customer-reported

Updated

  • Delete unacceptable symbols from query parameter #19481
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, waiting-for-response
  • 6.0 API Reviews #24743
    type-enhancement, area-global, 6.0.0
  • Internal exceptions when using .AsSplitQuery #25225
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Select + Distinct + Select Collection results in incorrect SQL and results #24263
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, Risky, 6.0.0
  • Pre-configuration value conversion for struct doesn't work for nullable properties of the struct #25416
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2
  • Improve exception message for invalid pre-convention configurations #25521
    type-bug, area-perf, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2
  • Can't explicit load many-to-many relationships. #24329
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • OwnsMany projection exception: The given key 'EmptyProjectionMember' was not present in the dictionary #22089
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, punted-for-5.0, 6.0.0
  • Inverse property mapping ignores namespace in partial class property #25565
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building
  • Model building API: additional configurability of the default conversion for any property of a given type #20418
    type-enhancement, propose-close, customer-reported, area-model-building, area-o/c-mapping, Backlog
  • Improvements to model building and conventions #22952
    Epics
  • Support single configuration for all uses of an owned type, shared type, or some arbitrary base class/interface #6787
    type-enhancement, punted-for-2.0, consider-for-current-release, punted-for-3.0, area-model-building, punted-for-5.0, Backlog
  • Scaffold tool can create an inverse property with a similar name to a column property and get confused #25292
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-scaffolding, 6.0.0
  • Migrations and Nullable Reference Types #18950
    type-enhancement, breaking-change, consider-for-current-release, customer-reported, area-migrations, punted-for-6.0, Backlog
  • Remove useless Convert node when the type mapping doesn't change #25597
    type-enhancement, area-query, Backlog
  • Handle old migrations with 32-bit identity seed values #25589
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-migrations-seeding, area-sqlserver, 6.0.0
  • Support the new SingleOrDefault/FirstOrDefault/LastOrDefault overloads that allow specifying a default #25569
    type-enhancement, area-query, consider-for-next-release, Backlog
  • Support SQL translation for .Net 6 Linq's MinBy/MaxBy Methods #25566
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-query, consider-for-next-release, Backlog
  • Investigate references between proxies and pooled DbContext instances for memory leaks #25486
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-dbcontext, 6.0.0
  • Question on Cosmos DB database provider owned object querying null #24087
    type-bug, blocked, customer-reported, area-query, area-cosmos, Backlog
  • Query: Deal with same querycontext parameter having multiple inferred type mapping #19503
    type-bug, needs-design, area-query, Backlog
  • Why are AppendIdentityWhereCondition and AppendRowsAffectedWhereCondition abstract and rest is virtual? #10431
    type-cleanup, providers-beware, needs-design, area-save-changes, consider-for-next-release, Backlog
  • Support new .NET 6.0 LINQ features #25570
    type-enhancement, area-query, User Story, Epics
  • Conversion errors in debugger are unhelpful #25600
    customer-reported
  • [Cosmos] Objects sometimes corrupted and mutated in memory on DbContext.Set<T>().Add call #25560
    customer-reported
  • Improve the Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite EF Core database provider #22950
    Epics
  • Query/Table Hints (raw SQL, such as OPTIONs) #6717
    type-enhancement, area-query, area-relational-mapping, Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Better pattern match to add code to join fetch entity when inc… #25636
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25635
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: Clone shaped query expression during translation #25634
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25619
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Linking more conceptual docs from API docs #25618

Merged

  • Disable nullability in migrations #25633
    auto-merge
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25632
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Stop wrapping OperationCancellationException with DbUpdateException #25628
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' into release/6.0 #25621
  • Disable nullability in migrations (RC1) #25629
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/6.0 to main #25620
  • Tweaks to ValueComparer nullability (RC1) #25623
    auto-merge
  • Disable nullability in migrations #25626
    auto-merge
  • Tweaks to ValueComparer nullability #24410
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25617
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add a pubternal way to namespace-qualify ambiguous types in compiled model. #25605
  • Merge 6.0-rc1 to 6.0 #25616
  • Query: Allow using STET overload for Set in query filter/defining query #25581
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25611
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Approach for referencing conceptual docs #25530
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25612
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25609
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25602
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix malformed XML doc in StoreObjectIdentifier #25608
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25606
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Query: Remove redundant override of TranslateSubquery #25637
  • Support value conversion for ReadOnlyIPAddress #25587
